About Susan Lynn

Susan Lynn (pen name for Susan Stockl) grew up—and still lives—in a small riverfront town near where Zomoëba takes place. A former IT professional and nonprofit director, she first discovered her love of writing through grant proposals (because what’s more thrilling than justifying a budget in under 500 words?).

Inspired by her mother’s fascination with science and nature, she blended that curiosity with a lifelong love of speculative and medical thrillers. "Zomoëba: The Price of Playing God" began with a single question: What if the environment shifted just enough to let something ancient slip through?

When she’s not writing, Susan enjoys time with her children and grandchildren—quietly passing on the same wonder she once learned.
